page.title: 13 EDUCATION IN LITCHAM
page.content: The importance of L.H.S.is very great. It provides pupils within 150 square miles with education.There has only been 1 Headmaster since 1978.Most teachers come from surrounding villlages but some come from further afield.There are 20 villages in the catchment area.There are 536 pupils at L.H.S. and 110 first years will arrive in September.The buses run to all the villages in the catchment area.L.H.S. helps old people by running evening clubs such as ballroom dancing.It also holds evening classes for adult education.Opening in September '85,is a new multi-sports centre.This will be equiped with floodlights and will be open to all members of the public.Many fifth year pupils help to clear up village greens and add seats around the green.These activities have pleased many members of the community.
